userNotFound: User not found. Please check the information you entered.
emailNotVerified: Your email is not verified. Please check your inbox and confirm your address.
invalidPassword: Incorrect password. Please try again or reset your password if you have forgotten it.
userNotAuthorized: User not authorized. Please log in to gain access.
twoFactorTokenNotFound: Two-factor authentication token not found. Please make sure you requested a token for this email address.
invalidTwoFactorCode: Invalid two-factor authentication code. Please check the code you entered and try again.
twoFactorTokenExpired: The two-factor authentication token has expired. Please request a new token.
twoFactorRequired: Please check your email. Two-factor authentication code is required.
checkEmailForConfirmation: Please check your email for confirmation.
registrationFailedEmailExists: Registration failed. A user with this email already exists. Please use another email or log in.
registrationSuccess: You have successfully registered. Please confirm your email. A message has been sent to your email address.
tokenNotFound: Token not found. Please check the token you entered or request a new one.
tokenExpired: The token has expired. Please request a new token to confirm the password reset.
passwordChangedNotificationHTML: Hello! Your password has been successfully changed. If you did not perform this action, you can reset your password.
enterCodeToCompleteHTML: Please enter this code in the application to complete the authentication process.
ignoreIfNotRequestedHTML: If you did not request this code, please ignore this message.
passwordResetInstructionsHTML: Hello! You have requested a password reset. Please click the following link to create a new password:
linkValidityNoticeHTML: This link is valid for 1 hour. If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this message.
emailConfirmationInstructionsHTML: Hello! To confirm your email address, please click the following link:
emailLinkValidityNoticeHTML: This link is valid for 1 hour. If you did not request email confirmation, please ignore this message.
authTokenNotFound: Authorization token not found. Please make sure you have the correct token.
confirmationTokenExpired: The confirmation token has expired. Please request a new token to confirm.
userNotFoundRetry: User not found. Please check the email address you entered and try again.
failedToGetUserWithUrl: Failed to retrieve user from {{profile_url}}. Please check the validity of your access token.
noTokensWithUrl: No tokens found at {{access_url}}. Please make sure the authorization code is valid.
pleaseEnterDeletionCodeHTML: Please enter this code to delete your account
unauthorizedCodeWarningHTML: If you did not request this code, someone else might have accessed your account. Please change your login credentials immediately.
confirmationCodeSent: The confirmation code has been sent to your email.
treeLinkExpired: The link to access the tree has expired.
invalidActionForEmail: This action is not allowed for this email.
